meta.name: description
meta.content: StatSVN retrieves information from a Subversion repository and generates various tables and charts describing the project development.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: SubVersion, StatCVS, Statistics Subversion, svn, Code Repository, svn statistics, svn graphs, java, open source

meta.name: Copyright
meta.content: StatSVN Team and ObjectLab Financial Ltd

meta.name: Designer
meta.content: StatSVN Team and ObjectLab Financial Ltd

section.name: Demos..
section.p: We thought it would be nice to have some "demo" against some major OS projects, so here you go:

ol.li: Spring Rich Client (java rich client library from Spring)
Ant (Apache Ant, had more than 500,000 revisions)

section.p: If you would like us to add an open source project, please raise an issue on SF and provide us with the following information:

ol.li: URL to anonymous Subversion server for the trunk
List of tags, versions that should be identified.

section.p: We cannot guarantee inclusion but you never know...
